mapper.insert: insert into PurchaseHistory(Phnum, EPNUM, Purchase_date, Purchase_price, Mnum, Nnum) values(seq_purchaseHistory.nextval, #{epnum}, sysdate, #{Purchase_price}, #{mnum}, #{nnum})
mapper.select: SELECT NNUM FROM PURCHASEHISTORY WHERE MNUM =#{mnum} GROUP BY NNUM
